video_prompt: Steampunk-clad individual, blonde hair swaying, subtly shifts gaze, holds a long rifle, hands adjusting grip, body rotating slightly, embellished hat subtly tilting, overall a dynamic, yet controlled, movement.
image_prompt: Full-body portrait of a fair-skinned woman with long blonde wavy hair, wearing a steampunk outfit. She has a white off-shoulder ruffled blouse, dark olive-green corseted bodice with lacing, and a short pleated olive-green skirt. Accessories include a brown leather belt with gears and a pouch, brown leather garters with metallic embellishments, a wide-brimmed hat decorated with golden gears, and brown lace-up knee-high boots with light socks. She holds a long wooden and metallic rifle horizontally. Her expression is calm with delicate makeup. Plain black background.
refined_video_prompt: Blonde hair sways. Eyes subtly shift focus. Hands adjust a rifle's grip. The body rotates gently, causing an embellished hat to subtly tilt. A controlled, dynamic sequence of minute adjustments unfolds.
